revision.text: Possibly: A Vindication of the Authority, Constitution and Laws of the Church and State of Scotland. In Four Conferences. To which are Annexed Observations on the First and Second of the Canons, Commonly Ascribed to the Holy Apostles. Wherein an Account of the Primitive Constitation and Government of Churches is contained. Drawn from Ancient and Acknowledg'd Writings. By Gilbert Burnet, D.D. late Lord Bishop of Sarum. (London : Printed for W. Mears, at the Lamb, and D. Browne, Fun. at the Black Swan, without Temple-Bar, M.DCC.XXIV [1724]). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b2408470~S1
